DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effect Atorvastain Renal Function Patients With Type II Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 4070 yr 2. estimate GFR 30 90 ml/min 3 . BMI < 35 4 . Fertile woman use oral contraceptive IUD 5 . HbA1c < 10 % 6 . Urinealbumin < 1,5 g/l 1 . Treatment insulin 2 . Cerobrovascular insult disease brain 3 . Insufficiency heart lungs 4 . Liverdisease ALAT > 200 U/L 5. hemoglobin < 7,0 mmol/l 6 . Cancer 7 . Alcohol abuse 8 .
